content: was chosen as the filler block for august 2017 in the block- a-month cal she has kindly offered her notes on those additional rounds follow original instructions through round 9 shell skip 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet picot 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet slip_stitch in next st round 10 attach color b with slip_stitch in any round 9 chain-2 corner space single_crochet slip_stitch in same space shell 4 times skip 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet picot 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 st slip_stitch single_crochet slip_stitch in chain-2 corner space 3 times shell 4 times skip 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet picot 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 st slip_stitch in beginning slip_stitch to join 5 shells per side 4 slip_stitch-single_crochet-slip_stitch corners fasten_off round 11 attach color a with treble_crochet in any corner single_crochet 2 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in back horizontal loop of picot treble_crochet 3 double_crochet treble_crochet in round 9 double_crochet below next slip_stitch 4 times single_crochet in back horizontal loop of picot 3 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet in corner single_crochet 3 times single_crochet in back loop of picot treble_crochet 3 double_crochet treble_crochet in round 9 double_crochet below next slip_stitch 4 times single_crochet in back horizontal loop of picot slip_stitch in first treble_crochet to join 34 sts per side fasten_off round 12 attach color c with half_double_crochet in double_crochet at center of any 9-st corner fan half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in each of next 33 sts 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in next st 3 times half_double_crochet in each of next 33 sts slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet to join 37 half_double_crochet per side and 4 chain-2 corner spaces fasten_off and weave in ends © 2012 joyce d lewis simple 10-petal afghan square page 3 of 3
